jobs.title: User Interface (UI) Design
description: I design visually appealing user interfaces, not just to look good but to guide your user a through every interaction of you website or app.
The user is at the forefront of each step of the process and the visual aspects of the UI are just an extension of the overall experience for the user.
Every button, every input is there due to research and planning during the UX stage.

jobs.title: User Experience (UX) Design
description: A stunning UI design isn't good enough on its own, it may be the soul of your website but the real heart is in how your users interact with your service or product.

During the initial UX phase I aim to establish the most intuitive experience that helps to guide your users to accomplish the tasks they need to achieve. I do this through a series of sitemapping, information architecture and wireframing.

sections.name: about
sections.sub_text: The man, the myth, the designer
body_text: I'm Joe, I'm a freelance UI designer based in Blackpool up on the North west coast of the UK.
For over a decade I have been crafting modern, usable interfaces for the web and mobile apps with clients around the world.

I love creating designs for startups and businesses with a genuine passion for their digital products and services, companies who value design and how it solves business problems with good user experience.
I am currently taking on new UI design projects. If you're in need of a design solution for your business, let’s chat.
